bitbucket_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to Bitbucket repo ${bitbucket_repo} in ${node}
bitbucket_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in Bitbucket repo ${bitbucket_repo} in ${node}
bitbucket_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in Bitbucket repo ${bitbucket_repo} in ${node}
